title: Mona Scott-Young on Her Foray Into Reality TV
description: Mona Scott-Young, CEO of Monami Entertainment and executive producer of the “Love & Hip Hop” franchise, discusses her transition from entertainment enthusiast to talent manager, as well as Black representation and opportunities in the media industry. She speaks with Romaine Bostick on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
